On Sat, 29 Jan 2005 20:13:47 -0000, "leighdodds2001"
<ldodds@...> said:
> GET /location?x=110022&y=220033

Or /location/x=110022;y=220033

This is in the URI spec, it lets you use name value
pairs within a path segment.
